name: Book of Mystery
description:
Dodge the incoming pages of doom by slipping into the next page in a never ending struggle to stay alive.

How to play:

Keyboard: 

- Move: Arrow keys

- Jump: Space

Controller: 

- Move: Joystick or D-Pad

- Jump: A-button

Credits:

Art and Music: Masterofmosh

Other stuff: Penjami
